sent.orig: Throwing Weapon Specialization: Increase Throwing Weapon skill.
sent.trans: 投掷武器专精：增加投掷武器技能。

sent.orig: Growing weapon space time: weapon not only be forged, strengthened and also has experience value.
sent.trans: 成长武器：武器不仅能锻造、强化，杀敌还有经验值。

sent.orig: Armour and Weapon Proficiency: Masters of the field gain no additional armour or weapon proficiencies.
sent.trans: 武器和防具擅长：竞技大师不获得任何格外的武器和盔甲擅长。

sent.orig: The complexity of a weapon is inversely proportional to the IQ of the weapon's operator.
sent.trans: 武器的复杂程度和操作者的智商成反比。

sent.orig: Poisoned Melee Weapon Allows you to add poison to the blade of your melee weapon.
sent.trans: 刃器淬毒你可以在刃类武器上涂上巨毒。
